title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, generate, pull, push, list, copy, delete models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama for chat, completion and embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with model management, chat history and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, streaming, embeddings, model operations.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple interface to chat, generate and manage models.

title: ollama-cli (community)
summary: Interactive TUI for Ollama written in Rust; browse, chat, switch models inside the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot chat sidebar.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app that streams responses from a local Ollama server via ollama-js.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration offering OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator components.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official C# .NET SDK for Ollama; supports .NET 6+, async enumerables, System.Text.Json.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and model init containers.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) and Docker Compose examples for running Ollama.

title: ollama-model-librarian
summary: Python CLI that curates and bulk-imports Hugging-Face models into Ollama with Modelfile generation.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store + LangChain retrieval.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets users chat with any Ollama model through slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for private or channel LLM conversations.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package derivation for Ollama; pinned binaries and module for NixOS services.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async HTTP client for Ollama’s API with serde types.
